reviews.review: Every time I play this game, I hate it. I don't enjoy playing it one bit, I'm so nervous and concerned about how I'm going to perform. Then, once I come off the game, I go "Wow, I love CS:GO, cannot wait to play some more" 10/10
indeed yes very good game would recommend yes yes
